old:
<COL ffdc78>ポーンと旅をする上で、特に戦闘時
とても重要になるのが《ポーン命令》です</COL>

回復の要請、エンチャントの要請、
追従指示、待機指示、特定スキルの発動など
プレイヤーが必要に応じた命令をくだす
ことで、よりポーンとの共闘を
有利に運ぶことができます
new:
<COL ffdc78>When traveling with a Pawn, it is particularly important in combat to give Pawn orders. </COL>

Requesting recovery, requesting enchantments, giving follow commands, standby commands, activating specific skills, etc.
By giving orders that respond to the player's needs, you can effectively cooperate with Pawns and gain an advantage in battle.

new:
Pawn orders can be performed from <COL ffdc78>Pawn orders</COL> in the game menu<KC UI_GAME_MENU> of the character tab.

However, it is recommended to register them in the <KC UI_SC_COMMU>Shortcut Bar for quick command during combat.
